items.sentence: Don\'t you know that everybody is talking about us?
Don\'t you think what Tom suggested is a good idea?
I suppose you\'ve heard about what happened to Tom.
I suspect that Tom won\'t want to do that tomorrow.
I didn\'t know Tom could play the trombone so well.
I don\'t like pizza any more than I like spaghetti.
I wondered whether Tom told Mary to do that or not.
I wondered whether Tom wanted us to be here or not.
I would advise you strongly to do what Tom advised.
All of us can speak French, so let\'s speak French.
